dimensions.label: Learning Habits
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out diverse sources and perspectives to deepen understanding.
Your FarTwin will carefully evaluate information, recognizing potential biases and limitations.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will confidently participate in group conversations, sharing their thoughts and ideas freely.
Your FarTwin will thoughtfully consider others' opinions before contributing to the conversation.

dimensions.label: Innovation Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach creative problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will boldly try new approaches, embracing potential failure as a learning opportunity.
Your FarTwin will meticulously examine existing solutions, identifying areas for improvement before innovating.

dimensions.label: Technical Comfort
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle technical tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will effortlessly navigate and utilize various software tools, leveraging their full potential.
Your FarTwin may struggle with technical tasks, requiring guidance or additional training to become proficient.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will enthusiastically share artistic or creative pursuits, inspiring others with their passion.
Your FarTwin will thoughtfully curate their creative output, striving for quality and precision over mere expression.

dimensions.label: Collaborative Mindset
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach teamwork?

options.description: Your FarTwin will warmly collaborate with others, valuing mutual support and shared success.
Your FarTwin will assertively pursue individual goals, potentially at the expense of team harmony.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements?

options.description: Your FarTwin will forcefully express their opinions, potentially escalating conflicts through assertive confrontation.
Your FarTwin will tactfully mediate disputes, seeking to find mutually beneficial solutions and maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin tackle complex challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience, making informed decisions based on subconscious patterns.
Your FarTwin will meticulously analyze data and evidence, using logical reasoning to arrive at a solution.
